name: Aria: Strings Of Sorrow
description:
Play as Aria, a young violinist chasing a slippery dream.

Aria is an aspiring musician who tants to go to college to study music. However, born into a family of high status, their parents expect her to follow the career of a doctor. How will her parents react when they know she didn not apply tothe Medicine University, and how will her life chage? Join her in this emotional rollercoaster and follow her along this rockfull path.

Features
  • Singplayer game with a sorrowful environment
  • Emotional and immersive narrative
  • Very simple controls
Controls
  • Movement - WASD / Arrow Keys
  • Interact - Z
  • Cancel - X
The Studio

Cyan Rhino is a team that was formed to develop this university project. We may be new to this craft, but we are working towards improving and open to any suggestion you wanna leave in the comments!
